description:
Nodoka goes to work as usual, but everything is a bit unusual. Is it opposite day?
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Fushigi no Kuni no Nodoka / Shimoochiai Touka Ureru / Takanashi Rei to Kutsushita / Yorozuba Meika to Momoshina Fumika / Hokuraku Shimon vs Pippy / Yoroshiro Eri no Tsugaru Shard Jifubuki Taiken Tour / Jinguuji Mari no Izakaya Tanbou
